notes: Brand new or recently renovated unfurnished apartment in excellent condition with clean white walls, polished tile floors, and modern TOTO bathroom fixtures with glass shower enclosures. Good natural light from windows with balcony access. The balcony has appropriate railings for safety; no visible stairs or sharp corners pose immediate baby concerns, though the hard tile floors would need area rugs. Comes completely unfurnished which means you'll need to purchase all furniture and appliances.
